channel.title: Members randomly dying in world 2
channel.description:
http://forum.runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/forums.ws?14,15,46,23376836,goto,73
Yes, this happened to me in Ardougne. I got a message saying "I;m killing you" and I was hit a 50 then again and I was dead. What gives? I don't even know how to report this as a bug.
looks like someone with a working deob has found an exploit ROFL (of course jagex will deny this and say it was just a bug in thier game) with my thinking it has to be a short list, all I can think of at the moment that could be doing it is: 1. pplsuqbawlz 2. krichevskoy whoever is doing it great job ;D

item.title: Members randomly dying in world 2
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

On the runescape forums, Paul said:

As you may be aware we had a bug in the game which occasionally hit people for high numbers at random causing them to die. This has now been fixed and we apologise for any inconvenience caused.

We will NOT be doing a roll back.

This bug happens in quite specific areas under very specific circumastances. It was actually very obscure and not something which we’d have been able to pick up under normal testing.

It has actually been in the game for a little while (it’s definitly been in longer than the new engine update) and we hadn’t heard anything about until this morning.

We do not believe many people at all have been affected in a way which lost them valuable items. - Hence why there will be no roll back.

The only reason that it suddenly came to a head in the last couple of hours is because suddenly it became widely known and people started standing around on mass in the affected areas to see people die.
Obviously most these people would have bought three or less valuable items, so those deaths don’t really count.

We simply can’t refund lost items. Sorry this has always been our policy - they’ll just be to many people making false claims on this, especially those who have actually died due to their own carelessness and decide to try it on to get their items back,
It’s just not going to be possible to tell who’s lying and who’s not.

And yes I’m sure this bug IS fixed. That’s why I’m saying it’s fixed. Now we know what the bug was - we can easily tell whether it’s happening or not

Read full topic

item.title: Members randomly dying in world 2
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:28, topic:3003”][quote author=Krichevskoy link=topic=3405.msg33857#msg33857 date=1148044072]

When has the happened? i thought they updated there client and slimmed it down to nothing making it extremely difficult to deob which would mean this couldnt be a client side hack or someone has managed to deob it.

Me
Though I haven’t logged in yet due to my ongoing trap search and lack of regular net access.
PSB still updated partially…so maybe it was ppl? Somehow I think it might really be a bug, because I’m sure Jagex has attack-range checking and there’s no way someone who found an exploit like that would be dumb enough to keep using it after a crowd gathered.
[/quote]

thats why I naturally assumed it was krichevskoy or pplsuqbawlz :D[/quote]

Wow, already managed to deob it!!

Joob job man, I knew you were good at Java, but I never knew you were that good!

Read full topic
